QuestData.Title: Ivus the Forest Lord
QuestData.Description: The Frostwolf Clan is protected by a taint of elemental energy. Their shaman meddle in powers that will surely destroy us all if left unchecked.$B$BThe damage has grown too great for the Circle to control! Ivus must be called to our aid.$B$BThe Frostwolf soldiers carry elemental charms called storm crystals. We can use the charms to conjure Ivus. Venture forth and claim the crystals, $n!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Horde and loot a Storm Crystal and return it to Archdruid Renferal in Alterac Valley.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Archdruid Renferal in Alterac Valley.
